Class ServeDataServlet

  • java.lang.Object

      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.WebappServlet
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.ServeDataServlet

  • public class ServeDataServlet
extends WebappServlet
    Servlet to serve ServeData objects Note this has to work for externally authenticated sessions as well as logged in sessions
